name: Kojo 2.9.24 (Java 17 pre-release)
body:
Pre-release to test Java 17 compatibility.

This is a place for sharing the latest built binaries for version 2.9.24.
Current build - 2.9.24 r11, 24 Nov 2022.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.23
body:
Highlights:
- Turkish refinements - contributed by Bulent Basaran
- Downgrade of JRE to 11.0.13 - due to a macOS issue with the previous upgrade to 11.0.15

name: Kojo Release 2.9.22
body:
**Important Note** - don't use this release on Macs. The Upgraded JRE does not work correctly on macOS.

Highlights:
- Turkish localization improvements
- Code completion improvements
- JRE upgrade to 11.0.15

name: Kojo Release 2.9.21
body:
Highlights:
- Refinements to picRow and picCol - to align them with picRowCentered and picColCentered
- Look and Feel (FlatLaf) upgrade
- Misc tweaks

name: Kojo Release 2.9.20
body:
Highlights:

- Smoother animations.
- Support for Picture z-index - for use in overlapping parallel animations.
- Picture clipping.
- Chess support refinements contributed by Ida Rasmark.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.19
body:
Highlights:
- The Picture withXx transforms now work exactly like the thatsXx transforms.
- Tweaks to the order of Picture effects.
- Some more regular picture transforms.
- Initial chess support contributed by Ida Rasmark.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.18
body:
Highlights:
- Improved communication with the (new) code exchange (https://codex.kogics.net/).
- Refinements to the method based transforms for Pictures - picture.thatsXX transforms contributed by Anay Kamat.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.17
body: Minor refinements.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.16
body:
Highlights:
- Composable animations with transitions and keyframes/timelines (many thanks to Anay Kamat for his inputs on this).
- Method based Picture transformations (thanks to Anay for bringing this up!)
- Java upgrade to 11.0.13

name: Kojo Release 2.9.15
body:
Highlights:
- `draw` refinement (to better support functional picture drawing).
- `arc`s for paths in `Picture.fromPath` (contributed by Anay Kamat).
- `animateWithState` and `animateWithRedraw` variants of animate (based on inputs from Anay).
- improvements to `timeit`.
- new picture transforms - `scalep / scaleAboutPoint`, `distantLight`,  and `bounds`.
- a couple of new samples (desert tree and pulsating lamp; contributed by Anay).

name: Kojo Release 2.9.14
body:
Highlights:
* Intial support for remote-coding (for robotics).
* Support for pictures built from (processing-like) sketches.
* Turkish and French refinements

name: Kojo Release 2.9.13
body:
Highlights:
* More samples.
* Updated translations.
* Suppressed FlatLAF related (benign) warning while launching Scratchpad on Windows.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.12
body:
Highlights:
- New Look and Feel
- Runaway script stopping improvements
- Sample tweaks
- Angles Playground is back
- Todo: more points

Legacy Windows installer is here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1utB9UjXAAUP_ChrkKts9RsD981VcWqKA/view?usp=sharing

name: Kojo Release 2.9.11
body:
Highlights:
- Turkish enhancements.
- Advanced sample games (Othello and Unbeatable Tic-Tac-Toe).
- Minor miscellaneous enhancements.

A zip distribution for legacy windows (with bundled JRE 8u152) is available at:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1SheBVvBY_hVB4jKqgLcsBNTt-vUtFgMT

name: Kojo Release 2.9.10
body: Huge Enhancements to the Turkish translation by Bulent!

name: Kojo Release 2.9.09
body:
* Initial support for extensions (to make it easier to wire in things like [kojo-ai](https://github.com/litan/kojo-ai-2)).
* Refinements to Turkish translation.
* New Spanish translation.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.08
body:
* Enhancements to Turkish translation.
* Joystick tweaks.

name: Kojo Ebooks
body: Publishing area for Kojo ebooks.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.07
body:
* Turkish translation contributed by Bulent Basaran.
* Sprite-sheets can now be loaded off the net.
* Joystick improvements.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.06
body:
* Ability to load mp3 files off the web.
* Support for `eval`.
* Support for screens.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.05
body:
* Add web-app export
* Bump up bundled Java version
* Some minor tweaks

name: Kojo Release 2.9.04
body:
* Bump up Scala to 2.13.3
* Bump up bundled Java to 11.0.7
* Add virtual Joystick control for games (driven by iKojo on mobile)
* Sync some sample games with iKojo
* Access code exchange via https

name: Kojo Release 2.9.03
body:
* Support for vertex shapes - for turtles, pictures, and canvas sketches. This includes support for polygons and curves using (r, theta) coordinates - which enables easy drawing of circular patterns like mandalas and yantras.
* Code completion improvements.
* New code templates for test and sketch.
* New viewTranslate(x, y), viewRotate(a), and viewScale(f) commands.

name: Kojo Release 2.9.02
body:
* Upgrade arithmetic aerobics for Scala 2.13
* Make sure libk is a directory

name: Kojo Release 2.9.01
body:
* JVM upgrade from version 8 to version 11 (with 25% decrease in installer size)
* Scala upgrade to version 2.13.2
* Neural Style Transfer enhancements
* Canvas Sketch API enhancements
* Breakpoint enhancements
* ColorMaker enhancements
* timeit command
* New tutorials

More information here:
https://kojoenv.wordpress.com/2020/05/03/new-kojo-release-2-9-01/

name: Kojo Release 2.7.11
body:
Highlights:
* Breakpoints
* [Neural Style Transfer](https://github.com/litan/kojo_neural_style)
* HSB color support in ColorMaker and IPM

name: Kojo Release 2.7.10
body:
* Add support for setup, drawLoop method of drawing.
* Add keyboard shortcut for stopping scripts.
* Add mouse move handler support for canvas.
* Add new picture creation methods (Picture.point, Picture.ellipseInRect)
* Add noPen command for pictures and turtles.
* Add new mathx methods (distance, angle).
* Introduce an API for canvas (low-level) drawing to support efficient generative art for drawings with a million plus elements.
* Add code template for canvasSketch

name: Kojo Release 2.7.09
body:
Highlights:
* Better stopping of runaway scripts.
* New Picture methods - hgap, vgap, showAxes, and showBounds.
* initRandomGenerator - utility methods for keeping track of and setting random seeds for reproducibility.
* Perlin noise.
* Delaunay triangulation.
* Picture.fromCanvas for low level (immediate mode) drawing.
* More randomxx functions.
* ColorMaker enhancements (including hex, hsluv, IPM, etc)
* User-supplied (lazy) transforms for pictures
* User-supplied (lazy) filters for image pictures

name: Kojo Release 2.7.08
body:
* 64 bit Windows build
* Line cap/join control
* Image export settings/refinements
* Random seed control
* Image filtering refinements
* Color gradient refinements

name: Kojo Release 2.7.07
body:
* More efficient code running.
* New commands to center Pictures in the canvas.
* Fixed loading of *Beginner Challenges* on Windows.
* Scala upgrade to 2.12.10.
